laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: PRKACA rearrangements by Fluorescence in situ Hybridization (FISH)
laboratory_examinations.findings: All four hepatic adenomas were negative for PRKACA rearrangements by FISH.
All four hepatic adenomas showed complete loss or significant reduction of LFABP expression. Three synchronous adenomas classified as type 1 showed complete loss, while one showed partial loss.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The adenoma that arose in the setting of the Carney complex showed partial loss of LFABP.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Average 10-fold reduction in LFABP protein levels compared with matched normal liver tissue.
